live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
55203.summary: Some customers in the Meadowbrook area of Coquitlam are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
55203.title: Nov 16 - Coquitlam (Meadowbrook) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

55192.title: Nov 16 - Red Deer (Clearview Meadows) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
